trans-unit.source: Associates activities together in a correlation by representing a particular shared <see cref="T:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceKey" /> or transient context in the workflow.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로의 임시 컨텍스트 또는 특정 공유 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceKey" />를 나타내는 방법으로 활동을 하나의 상관 관계로 연결합니다.

trans-unit.source: Windows Workflow Foundation (WF) provides four types of correlation: [Content Based](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/content-based-correlation.md), [Request-Reply](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/request-reply-correlation.md), [Durable Duplex](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/durable-duplex-correlation.md), and [Context Exchange](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/context-exchange-correlation.md).
trans-unit.target: 네 가지 유형의 상관 관계를 제공 하는 Windows WF (Workflow Foundation): [콘텐츠 기반](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/content-based-correlation.md), [요청-회신](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/request-reply-correlation.md), [영 속 이중](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/durable-duplex-correlation.md), 및 [컨텍스트 교환 ](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/context-exchange-correlation.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about correlation, see [Correlation Overview](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/correlation-overview.md), the specific correlation types mentioned previously, and the correlation samples located in the [Services [WF Samples]](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/services.md) node of the WF samples.
trans-unit.target: 상관 관계에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [상관 관계 개요](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/correlation-overview.md), 특정 상관 관계 형식에서 설명한 및 상관 관계 샘플에 있는 [서비스 [WF 샘플] ](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/services.md) WF 샘플의 노드.

trans-unit.source: The runtime uses the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationInitializer.CorrelationHandle%2A> for correlation if it is present, otherwise the **CorrelatesWith** property of the messaging activity will be used.
trans-unit.target: 런타임에서 사용 하는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationInitializer.CorrelationHandle%2A> 가 존재 하지 않으면 상관 관계를 위해는 **CorrelatesWith** 메시지 활동의 속성을 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If both are absent, the ambient handle provided by <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope> or the workflow service is used.
trans-unit.target: 두 가지가 모두 없을 경우 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope>에서 제공하는 앰비언트 핸들 또는 해당 워크플로 서비스가 사용됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle> on a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendReply> activity.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle> 활동에 대해 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendReply>을 설정하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle" /> class.
Registers the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle" /> with the workflow runtime.
Unregisters the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle" /> with the workflow runtime.
